DOC.brief_summary: A study to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of inhaled Montelukast (MK-0476) in participants with mild or moderate asthma.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of Inhaled Montelukast (MK-0476) in Participants With Mild or Moderate Asthma (MK-0476-380 AM3)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Male or female between the ages of 18 and 65 Must have mild or moderate asthma (Part III only) Nonsmoker for at least 6 months History of stroke, chronic seizures or major neurological disorder You are nursing Drink more than 3 glasses of alcohol a day Have allergy to or not able to tolerate lactose Have a history of drug abuse in the last 5 years Drink more than 6 beverages containing caffeine a day Have had surgery, donated blood or participated in another investigational study in the last 4 weeks
